# Plan Your Visit

### Your Visit Starts Here 

## 

We have a new check-in policy to help make your visit to the BMA even better!

**Please reserve a free general admission ticket** before entering the Museum’s galleries. Tickets can be reserved online or at the Welcome Desk and will be accompanied by a short survey to help us better understand our visitors. By checking in, you’ll help us learn what brings people to the BMA, which allows us to create even more of the exhibitions, events, and experiences you love.

It only takes a moment, but it makes a big difference. Thank you for helping us make the BMA welcoming for all.

[Reserve General Admission](https://reservations.artbma.org/events/601/detail/67f50d5c9f596a1130263711)

**Please note:** Free general admission does not include access to [_Amy Sherald: American Sublime_](http://www.artbma.org/amysherald). You can add exhibition tickets to your cart while reserving general admission entry.

Learn more about our [school and group tour options](https://artbma.org/visit/tours-group-visits).

## 

## Museum Information

**We regularly install new artwork and enhance galleries to make your experience at the BMA even better. If you are visiting to see a particular artwork or gallery, please call 443-573-1701 to check its availability. We can’t wait to welcome you!**

General admission to the BMA is always free.

## Amy Sherald: American Sublime

This exhibition traces the artistic evolution of Amy Sherald, a defining voice of her generation who transformed American portraiture.

[On view through April 5, 2026. Tickets available now.](https://artbma.org/exhibition/amy-sherald-american-sublime)

### Plan Your Visit

__Reserve a free ticket to visit the BMA! Check-in helps us improve your experience.  
[Reserve General Admission](/visit/plan-your-visit)

__We are open Wednesday-Sunday from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. The Museum is now open until 9 p.m. on Thursday.  
[Hours & Information](/visit/hours-information)

__Our address is 10 Art Museum Drive, Baltimore, MD 21218  
[Directions & Parking](/visit/directions-parking)
